name: Yum-yum Galaxy 2
description: Yum-yum Galaxy 2 is a sequel to a class project in the EECS 494 - Video Game Development class at the University of Michigan - Ann Arbor. Play as a hungry planet trying to eat other planets and moons to grow larger. Grab asteroids to fight your enemies as you try to become big enough to eat and become the sun! (Windows/Mac Download)
